Module de.nicrizzos
Package de.nicrizzos.game

Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
de.nicrizzos.game.GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dialogue, DialogueNode, Entity
public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
Represents an object in the game world. Extend if necessary.

  • Field Details

    • identification

      protected java.lang.String identification
      Unique ID to identify the object by.

    • name

      protected java.lang.String name
      Non-unique name for the object.

    • specialAction

      protected boolean specialAction
      Define whether the object can be interacted with in a special way (i.e. with a key).

  • Constructor Details

    • GameObject

      public GameObject()
      Deprecated.
      1.0
      Creates an empty game object. Shouldn't use this.

    • GameObject

      public GameObject​(java.lang.String _id)
      Creates a game object by ID. Its name will be 'Empty object'.
      Parameters:
      _id - The ID for this game object.

    • GameObject

      public GameObject​(java.lang.String _name, java.lang.String _ID)
      Deprecated.
      1.0
      Creates a game object by name and ID. Shouldn't use.
      Parameters:
      _name - The name for this game object.
      _ID - The unique ID for this object.

    • GameObject

      public GameObject​(java.lang.String _name, java.lang.String _ID, boolean _specialAction)
      Creates a game object by name and ID. Also defined whether a special action is possible.
      Parameters:
      _name - The name for this game object.
      _ID - The unique ID for this object.
      _specialAction - Whether the object can be interacted with in a special way (i.e. with a key).
